rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with minimalistic Scandinavian design. Features simple geometric patterns and natural wood finishes.

Open-plan living area combining living room, dining space, and kitchenette; designed with a modern Scandinavian aesthetic emphasizing functional simplicity and light spaces. The design integrates natural lighting via large windows.
A dedicated home theater space integrated within the living area. Equipped with soundproofing and adjustable ambient lighting to create an immersive viewing experience.
Private bedroom designed with Scandinavian minimalism featuring built-in storage and a serene layout conducive to relaxation.
Compact bathroom located adjacent to the bedroom, featuring modern fixtures and clean lines in keeping with Scandinavian design principles.

openings.description: The main entrance ensures a smooth transition into the farmhouse with ample natural light and an inviting pathway to the central courtyard.
Large windows in the living area providing abundant natural daylight and ventilation. Vastu principles align window placement to enhance positive energy.
Window placed according to Vastu norms ensuring adequate light and privacy for the bedroom.

courtyard.description: A central courtyard that serves as a private outdoor living space, promoting natural ventilation and aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

roof.description: Flat roof incorporating green spaces or terrace options. Designed to offer additional outdoor seating area with Scandinavian style simplicity.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and ample storage. Features Scandinavian minimalist decor with clean lines and functional design.
Second bathroom designed for convenience. Incorporates Vastu principles for balanced spatial energy.

openings.description: Modern staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, designed with Scandinavian aesthetics and integrated with the overall floor plan.

roof.description: Flat roof design offering additional outdoor space and potential for a terrace, consistent with Scandinavian and Vastu design principles.
